Html: hello, in the example test "14excel5.php" the string "This invoice is payable within thirty days after the end of the month, unless otherwise specified on the invoice." should be "This invoice is payable within thirty days after the end of the month, unless otherwise specified on the invoice." because it does not apply the format, someone knows how to put rich-text in a cell, because the example not working, thanks

Looks like you're right! PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 does not support Rich-Text. You only get plain text. Not sure what it takes to implement this, but it may unfortunately not be that easy.

Work item has been created:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8916
